api_list.api_description: Retrieve the favicon for a specified domain. Optionally, specify the size of the favicon image.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain to retrieve the favicon from.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: A size hint for the favicon (e.g., 128, 256).

api_list.api_description: Shortens a given URL using the is.gd service.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you want to shorten.

query: I have a website with the domain 'example.com' and I want to retrieve its favicon. Once I have the favicon, I want to provide a shortened URL for sharing purposes. Can you help with this using the available APIs?
